title: Vertiente Artiguista
text:
The Vertiente Artiguista is a social-democratic <a href="political%20party">political party</a> in <a href="Uruguay">Uruguay</a> led by <a href="Enrique%20Rubio">Enrique Rubio</a>. Rubio will be the first candidate to the Senate at the October 27, 2019 National Elections.
It is variously translated as Artiguist Tendency, Artiguist Slant, and Artiguist Source. The adjective "Artiguist" honors the 19th-century national hero <a href="Jos%C3%A9%20Artigas">José Artigas</a>. The noun means "slope" literally and can also mean "point of view" and "aspect".
Electoral history.
Presidential elections.
Due to its membership in the <a href="Broad%20Front%20%28Uruguay%29">Broad Front</a>, the party has endorsed the candidates of other parties on several occasions. <a href="Elections%20in%20Uruguay">Presidential elections in Uruguay</a> are held using a two-round system, the results of which are displayed below.
